posts.title: KE GONG
posts.text: Biography I am currently a senior researcher and a team leader of Intelligent Speech Group at DMAI. I received my Master Degree at Human Cyber Physical Intelligence Integration Lab in Sun Yat-Sen University advised by Prof. Liang Lin.Email: kegong936 AT gmail.comGoogle Scholar Research InterestMy current research interest is to develop speech techniques for human-computer interaction applications such as smart home.I used to develop interpretable and structured machine learning techniques for computer vision tasks. I mainly investigated to exploit human commonsense and domain knowledge and further incorporated them to develop the advanced artificial intelligence system. Speech recognition, voice cloning, and speech synthesis Human-centric Analysis, including human pose estimation, human parsing Object understanding, including classification, segmentation, detection Academic Services Reviewer for TPAMI, PR, CVPR, ICCV, NeurIPS, AAAI, ECCV, WACV, ACCV
